data.comment: The match is underway. Santos have kicked-off.
Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
In the minute 3, Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Urbano Caldeira.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Santos in the half of Paranaense.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Paranaense have a dangerous throw-in.
Important block from the Santos defence as Maycon Nikao fires in a strike for Paranaense.
Paranaense are pushing forward but Wellington's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Santos.
Maycon Nikao (Paranaense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 15, Anderson Daronco awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Anderson Daronco signals a Paranaense throw-in in Santos's half.
In the minute 18, Santos have a goal kick.
Santos are coming forward and Marinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Can Paranaense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos's half?
In the minute 23, Vinicius Mingotti of Paranaense smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Lucas Verissimo is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
In the minute 26, Alex (Santos) has replaced the possibly injured Lucas Verissimo at Urbano Caldeira.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
Attention is being given to Santos’s Vladimir and play has been suspended briefly.
Santos’s Vladimir is on his feet again at Urbano Caldeira.
Yeferson Soteldo puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 29, Great play from Marinho to set up the goal.
Santos's Kaio Jorge misses with an attempt on goal.
Anderson Daronco awards Paranaense a goal kick.
In the minute 32, In Santos Paranaense attack through Maycon Nikao. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Santos.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in Santos.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Paranaense close to the penalty box.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Anderson Daronco waits before resuming play because Vladimir for Santos is still down.
The home team has substituted Vladimir with Joao Paulo. Cuca is thus making his second change.
In the minute 37, Yeferson Soteldo of Santos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Santos to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Paranaense.
In the minute 41, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
It's now 2-0 in Santos as Felipe Jonatan scores for Santos.
Marinho instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Santos.
In the minute 45, Paranaense to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Paranaense's Maycon Nikao fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, Anderson Daronco blows to start the second-half. Paranaense with the kick-off.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Santos's Yeferson Soteldo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 46, Goal kick for Paranaense at Urbano Caldeira.
Throw-in for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Carlos Eduardo is replacing Vinicius Mingotti for Paranaense at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 49, Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
Anderson Daronco awards Santos a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Play has been interrupted briefly in Santos to check on Marinho, who is grimacing with pain.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
In the minute 53, Marinho returns to the field for Santos after picking up a slight injury.
Santos are coming forward and Para gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Santos.
Alison (Santos) gets a yellow card.
Anderson Daronco signals a Santos throw-in in Paranaense's half.
In the minute 57, Santos needs to be cautious. Paranaense have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick in a good position for Paranaense!
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
In the minute 59, Paranaense are pushing forward but Marquinhos Gabriel's finish is wide of the goal.
Santos have a goal kick.
Anderson Daronco awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 60, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Paranaense in Santos.
Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
In the minute 63, Anderson Daronco awards Santos a goal kick.
Anderson Daronco signals a throw-in for Paranaense, close to Santos's area.
Richard is replacing Marquinhos Gabriel for the away team.
In the minute 64, Dorival Silvestre Junior is making the team's third substitution at Urbano Caldeira with Pedrinho replacing Vitinho.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Abner Vinicius of Paranaense gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Throw-in Santos.
Santos to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
In the minute 66, Free kick Santos.
Goal kick for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Marinho for Santos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
Santos needs to be cautious. Paranaense have an attacking throw-in.
Anderson Daronco signals a throw-in for Paranaense, close to Santos's area.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Anderson Daronco awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 74, Richard (Paranaense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Anderson Daronco signals a Paranaense throw-in in Santos's half.
Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Santos.
In the minute 77, Can Paranaense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos's half?
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dorival Silvestre Junior (Paranaense) is making a fourth substitution, with Khellven replacing Jonathan.
In the minute 78, The away team have replaced Maycon Nikao with Geuvanio. This is the fifth substitution made today by Dorival Silvestre Junior.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Santos pushes forward through Carlos Sanchez, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Santos close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Diego Pituca for Santos drives towards goal at Urbano Caldeira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 82, Santos have a goal kick.
Goal! Santos extend their lead to 3-0 through Marinho.
That's a fine assist from Luan Peres.
In the minute 84, The match at Urbano Caldeira has been interrupted briefly for a check on Marinho, who is down injured.
Cuca (Santos) is making a third substitution, with Tailson replacing Kaio Jorge.
In the minute 85, Paranaense have a dangerous throw-in.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Cuca (Santos) is making a fourth change, with Jobson replacing the possibly injured Marinho.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 87, It's a goal kick for the home team in Santos.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Paranaense.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 3-1 through a strike by Abner Vinicius. .
In the minute 88, Geuvanio with an assist there.
Paranaense's Leo Cittadini is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
At Urbano Caldeira the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Santos's Joao Paulo looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Yeferson Soteldo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Santos.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Throw-in high up the field for Santos in Santos.
Throw-in Paranaense.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Anderson Daronco awards Santos a goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-1.
Joao Paulo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
